H0.text: Circulatory is the system that contains the mouth, esophagus, and stomach, as described in the question about the human body's systems.

H1.text: Digestive is the system that includes the mouth, esophagus, and stomach.

H2.text: The nervous system is the system of the human body that includes the mouth, esophagus, and stomach.

H3.text: Skeletal is the system that includes the mouth, esophagus, and stomach.

A4.text: The human digestive system consists of the gastrointestinal tract plus the accessory organs of digestion (the tongue, salivary glands, pancreas, liver, and gallbladder).

A5.text: The stomach is a major organ of the gastrointestinal tract and digestive system.
